channel.title: State of the... site?
channel.description: I'm not in much of a mood for fancy writing to sway your minds, so I'll be short and as to the point as I get. moparisthebest presides over this website and arguably the RS cheating scene. Therefore, as something of a president, I think he should be required to give an address on the current state of things pertaining to this website. Anyone with me?

item.title: State of the... site?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:12, topic:148032”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=202905.msg1793192#msg1793192 date=1191234988]
you’re asking a hick that “owns” the public cheating scene to talk about whats happened?

all that has happened is he has run it into the ground with his newb-friendly, “i want ad money” attitude
[/quote]

So negative…

I think it would be good for someone to do this, but we don’t exactly progress here at Moparisthebest. We just sit around making random topics and bitching about the guys downstairs (moparscape) who actually do make some progress.[/quote]
no. progress does not happen at moparisthebest.com either. if they had progress they wouldnt need a application to restart their servers every 10 minutes. Fact is when you put the words runescape and programming together, you get Trash.

Read full topic

item.title: State of the... site?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:6, topic:148032”]you’re asking a hick that “owns” the public cheating scene to talk about whats happened?

all that has happened is he has run it into the ground with his newb-friendly, “i want ad money” attitude[/quote]

So negative…

I think it would be good for someone to do this, but we don’t exactly progress here at Moparisthebest. We just sit around making random topics and bitching about the guys downstairs (moparscape) who actually do make some progress.

Read full topic

item.title: State of the... site?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Moparisthebest:

A soviet plan would involve removing all the rep from the members, taking a large portion for myself, then equally distributing it among the rest of everyone.

What an excellent example of how 99% of people completely misunderstand communism. ++

Read full topic

Precisely, though I think it should be a bit more often than annually. Alternatively, something like the Soviet five-year plans would be even better.

item.title: State of the... site?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Except I am not a president, and therefore not ‘required’ to do anything

Interesting idea though, what would it consist of? A brief synopsis of what has happened over the last year and what will be done different in the coming year?

Read full topic
